Package net.kuujo.copycat

Copycat is a cluster coordination framework built on a Raft distributed log.

Package net.kuujo.copycat Description

Copycat is a cluster coordination framework built on a Raft distributed log. Copycat provides a set of abstractions for managing state consistently across a cluster.
Author:
Jordan Halterman
